thread.title: United Airlines issues statement about Oscar Munoz, President and CEO of United Airlines
thread.title_full: United Airlines issues statement about Oscar Munoz, President and CEO of United Airlines - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: United Airlines issues statement about Oscar Munoz, President and CEO of United Airlines
text:
United Airlines
CHICAGO , Oct. 16, We have been informed by Oscar's family that he was admitted to the hospital on Thursday and we will provide further details as appropriate. In the meantime, we are continuing to operate normally.
Our thoughts and prayers are with his family and we are respecting their privacy.
